greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: In the prime factorization of n, increment even powers and decrement odd powers (multiplicative).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[n_, k_] := n^(If[EvenQ[k], k + 1, k - 1]); Table[Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n], {n, 94}] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Aug 14 2013 *)
results.author: _Marc LeBrun_
